name: Soli Card Collection: Funny Ga
description:
Soli Card Collection: Funny Game 2 is to solve the puzzle by strategically stacking the cards of each suit in descending order. Now you can relax in any place through the palm of your hand. It is easy and full of fun, classic cards will evoke the original card swept the world when the memory. We inherited the nostalgic experience of the cards. If you like those classic games, you will love this game!
Game features:
simple and refined menu
Move cards just click
Large and easy to see cards
Customizable fine themes
Solitaire Solitaire - turn a card
Solitaire Solitaire - turn three cards
